title: Ore, Tsushima (I, Tsushima)
synopsis: One morning, an old lady meets a stray cat searching for food in garbage cans and decides to take him back home to give him a proper meal. Despite being surprised to learn that the cat named Tsushima has the ability to speak, she nevertheless chooses to adopt him and entertains all of his whims.
staff: [['Aoki, Jun', ['Director', ' Script']], ['Yamada, Junpei', ['Music']], ['Opuu no Kyoudai', ['Original Creator']]]
